Text.Page:
The ksharans killed my husband, , and I want revenge.

After all the close scrapes we had together, I guess I assumed that we'd always be together.

Beware, thoughâ€”those ksharans are lethal. My poor husband never knew what hit him.

This doesn't make the loneliness go away, but I'll admit it.

It puts a bit of a smile on my face. Thanks, .
Avenge my husband, <PCNAME>. Kill those ksharans!
